entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Umiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:10 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.2°C
entry.summary:

Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Humidity: 72 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
